issue.title: [Python] arrow_ep build is triggering during parquet-cpp build in Travis CI
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-2175](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2175). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
see e.g. https://travis-ci.org/apache/arrow/jobs/342781531#L5546. This may be related to upstream changes in Parquet

comments.body:
